Content: Yes and no. Easy enough to use. I give Accuracy an 8. It seems to be a resource hog, cramping up device. Frequently slow to open and function. : \ Update: Right after I posted this review, a default display setting changed on its own and it's not a setting available to me to change back. Yikes!
App Name: AccuWeather: Weather Alerts & Live Storm Radar
Strongest Sub-Dimension Definition: The app is ease to use, accessible, and respond quickly when the users interacts with it.
